remarks: An upper bound for the norm of a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmfnleub $p |- ( ( T : ~H --> CC /\ A e. RR* ) -> ( ( normfn ` T ) <_ A <-> A. x e. ~H ( ( normh ` x ) <_ 1 -> ( abs ` ( T ` x ) ) <_ A ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d T x $.
